div.ab: Ll. 4-26. "Freightage, reckoned in copper, 45 drachmas (?). Inspection tax at Memphis, silver, 4 drachmas. Thus there are added to the charges per 100 (artabas), 49 drachmas, 2 1/4 obols (?). Also in Memphis the . . . toll, at 1 chalkous per artaba, (total) silver, 2 drachmas 1/2 obol. Discount, 1 1/4 obols. Clerical charges on the boat,silver, 2 (drachmas) 4 obols. Distributed per 100 (artabas), with discount, 3 obols. Labor charge, 1 (drachma) 4 obols. Added for temple dues per 100 (artabas), tranposed into copper, 2 (drachmas) 3 obols. For commision agent, who will receive and measure, per 100, 1 drachma. Total charges per 100 artabas, in copper, 57 drachmas 2 obols. Figuring the total as 56 drachmas 2 obols, the charge per artaba is 3 1/2 obols, not including interest, lodging, food, police protection (?)." Verso: "T . . . to Phormio."
